content: आसनं [आस्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Sitting down. {@--2@} A seat, place, stool; स वासवेनासनसन्निकृष्टं <ls>Ku. 3. 2</ls>; आसनं मुच् to leave one's seat, rise; <ls>R. 3. 11.</ls> {@--3@} A particular posture or mode of sitting; <ab>cf.</ab> पद्म°, वीर°, भद्र°, वज्र° &c. {@--4@} Sitting down or halting, stopping, encamping. {@--5@} Abiding, dwelling; <ls>Ms. 2. 245</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">6. 59.</ls> {@--6@} Any peculiar mode of sexual enjoyment (84 such {%asanas%} are usually mentioned). {@--7@} Maintaining a post against an enemy (<ab>opp.</ab> यानं), one of the six modes of foreign policy; which are: --संधिर्ना विग्रहो यानमासनं द्वैधमाश्रयः <ls>Ak.</ls>; प्रतिबद्धशक्त्योः कालप्रतीक्षया तूष्णीमवस्थानमासनं; परस्परस्य सामर्थ्यविघातादासनं स्मृतं Agni P.; <ls>Ms. 7. 160</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">162</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">166</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 346</ls>; <ls>Pt. 3.</ls> {@--8@} The front part of an elephant's body, withers. {@--9@} Throwing (<ab>fr.</ab> अस् to throw). {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of two trees (असन and जीवक). --ना A seat, stool, stay. --नी {@--1@} Stay, abiding, sitting. {@--2@} A small seat or stool. {@--3@} A shop, stall.
